findings.description: The contract allows minting of unlimited number of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: _afterTokenTransfer
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability due to lack of checks on token transfer.

findings.title: renounceOwnership
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function has a critical vulnerability allowing an owner to relinquish ownership without proper access control.

findings.title: transferOwnership
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferOwnership function allowing onlyOwner to transfer ownership.

findings.title: _setOwner
findings.description: Private function _setOwner has restricted access but lacks clear documentation on its purpose and usage.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as external and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: Internal burn function without access modifier

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerabilities
findings.description: Multiple swap functions have been identified with potential vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in skim function

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The sync function is not properly protected and can cause reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and has no access modifier, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
